data.message: For all the dumb asses who think drake is better than Eminem....ima sit back and watch... If drake ever disses Eminem again...just know Drake's little wanna be gangster career is over...Eminem is the real king. We don't need him to prove it. We know what he can do. He's a real and true legend.

replies.message: Cowardly ass punk uses Em's professional ego to make a statement. I'm surprised Meekmill and Drake kissed and made up, whatever happened to that fake ass fight they had going on? Truth, people are all ya tripping or someshit. Drake is a buttkisser or someshit to be getting his in's like that!
This is my opinion. Everyone gets to have one. You get to chose if you agree or not. If you don't like what I had to say you can kindly ignore it or post your opinion else where.
^what kind of asshole are you?
I'm not an asshole. He is. I didn't appreciate his rude comment. I don't appreciate you calling me that either. Take your rude comments elsewhere.
Fuck drake....eminem he's the rap god ....the king of rap ..fuck those people who think that eminem is nothing ....daamn they r foolish
Right!! Thanks for agreeing. Some people are just to stubborn to see the truth.
Drake never had any beef with Em. It was a twisted rumor that came from an interview from someone else who talked to Drake.
www.getbestupdates.com
Technically Drake never said anything about Eminem. Hot 97 blew it all out of proportion.
Drake didn't trash Em. He DID trash Funkmaster Flex and Hot 97.
He never dissed em in the first place
Drake said last night on stage that em was the greatest of all time

Yall are fucking stupid drake is garbage as fuck em would rock drake and end his career... that feeling when eminem would fuck drake up in a 1 v1 but even  so em has d12 dre and major rappers back him.. so your arguement is invalid Love Kevin Tatted cause while drake is making millions em is making more and not giving a fuck what he makes cause he raps for his fans.
